This week we used the excellent weather conditions for a group hike.

After we had figured out where actually to go,

![](http://www.biomet.co.at/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/IMG_0711-300x200.jpg)

… and some involved grass scrambling

![](http://www.biomet.co.at/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/IMG_0714-300x200.jpg)

… we finally reached our “summit”, where we took a well-deserved break

![](http://www.biomet.co.at/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/IMG_0724-300x200.jpg)

… and marveled the gorgeous view.

![](http://www.biomet.co.at/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/IMG_0726-300x200.jpg)

“What goes up must come down” and so we eventually returned back and cooled down with a beer or two,

![](http://www.biomet.co.at/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/IMG_0728-300x200.jpg)

… replenished the burnt calories,

![](http://www.biomet.co.at/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/IMG_0731-300x200.jpg)

… after which we needed some help for digestion,

![](http://www.biomet.co.at/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/IMG_0732-e1435780866265-200x300.jpg)

… before we closed the hike with a game of viking chess.

![](http://www.biomet.co.at/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/IMG_0734-300x200.jpg)
